ingredients.ingredient: shredded cheddar cheese, or any other tasty cheese, shredded

steps.step: For the dip, cook ground beef until brown. Add taco seasoning and stir. Set the beef aside and cook chopped poblano pepper.
In a saucepan, combine all cheese Pretty much any amount of each will work. Melt over low heat. Stir in milk as needed to reach a medium-thick consistency.
Add beef and pepper. Stir until well combined. You may need to add more milk at this point.

For the bowl, preheat oven to 190째C / 375째F. Take a large flour tortilla and warm for a few seconds in the oven. Spray the outside of upside-down oven-safe bowl with canola oil and press tortilla over the top. Cook in oven until brown.

Set the beef aside and cook chopped poblano pepper.
In a saucepan, combine all cheese Pretty much any amount of each will work.
Stir in milk as needed to reach a medium-thick consistency.
You may need to add more milk at this point.
For the bowl, preheat oven to 190째C / 375째F.
Take a large flour tortilla and warm for a few seconds in the oven.
Spray the outside of upside-down oven-safe bowl with canola oil and press tortilla over the top.
